name: Checkpoint Commando
description:
THE GAME IS MEANT TO BE PLAYED IN FULLSCREEN, SO DOWNLOAD IT OR PLAY IT MAXIMIZED FOR THE BEST EXPERIENCE. What is Checkpoint Commando?

Checkpoint Commando is a platformer in which checkpoints are not given to you, but you have to place them yourself! There are 3 difficulties, each with less and less checkpoints at your disposal. The game has 3 unique levels. It was made as a practice project, so do not expect it to be without bugs. Feel free to report any in the comments.

Controls

A/D  -  Move left or right

Space  -  Jump

E - Place Checkpoint
